headline: Is Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) Pricing Look Reasonable After A 27.9% One Year Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Chipotle Mexican Grill is fairly priced or not, you are in the right place as we are about to unpack what the current share price could mean for long term investors. Chipotle's share price recently closed at US$38.05, with returns of 0.2% over the past week, a 4.0% decline over the last 30 days, 1.5% year to date, and a 27.9% decline over the past year, compared with gains of 27.2% over 3 years and 40.8% over 5 years. Recent attention on Chipotle has been shaped...
